channel.title: How to reinstall
channel.description: Hi, so I installed the game and started it, and have been getting problems with the textures. I know I have to reinstall but I can't find it installed on my computer. I can't uninstall via Add/Remove Programs and whenever I search for it all I find is the BlackMesa-Setup.exe file. I can't uninstall it via Steam as well. How do I completely uninstall this game?

item.title: How to reinstall
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Simply remove the files from your Steam folder.

It should have a path similar to this:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS

Also, this forum is not for issues related to Black Mesa. Go here for that.

Read full topic

item.title: How to reinstall
item.dc:creator: jimmyrustles
item.description:
Hi, so I installed the game and started it, and have been getting problems with the textures. I know I have to reinstall but I can’t find it installed on my computer. I can’t uninstall via Add/Remove Programs and whenever I search for it all I find is the BlackMesa-Setup.exe file. I can’t uninstall it via Steam as well.
How do I completely uninstall this game?
